title: Companion Cube
summaries: The Companion Cube is a pet summoning item. It has a chance of being sold by the Traveling Merchant for 5 PC. It summons a Companion Cube pet that will jump around the player frantically.

When the player and the Companion Cube are in complete darkness, the Cube can occasionally "stab" its owner, inflicting 3 damage. The stab can eventually kill the owner, displaying the unique death message "<Player name> was stabbed." Portable light sources, such as Torches or light pets, will completely remove chances of being stabbed by the Companion Cube.

When the Companion Cube falls into <linked>lava</linked>, it emits the <linked>Lunatic Cultist</linked>'s death sound. When submerged in lava for long enough, there is a chance it may make the <linked>Moon Lord</linked>'s death sound. The Companion Cube will also occasionally emit the flatulence sound normally produced by the <linked>Whoopie Cushion</linked> and its upgrades.

statistics.Buy: 5 PC
statistics.Sell: 1 PC
